cso.title: CSO Ireland Data
cso.description: Collection of tables from CSO Ireland

area_of_residence.description_html:
Hand Cleaned Table useful for geo aggregation.
Column
                    type_post_2014 is geo type after the chanages on Local Government areas.

                    (s = State, p = Provience, u = County, i = City, d = Dublin Council Area, su = Local Government
                     Area below a County level.)
 NUT relates to Geo Statistical Areas defined by EU for funding etc.

nuts_area_details.description_html: Population stats related to NUTS areas

VSA07.description_html: Deaths Occurring by Area of Residence, Sex, Age at Death and Year

VSAQ2.description_html: Deaths Registered Provisional by Age at Death and Quarter

VSQ17.description_html: Deaths Registered Provisional by Sex, Statistic and Quarter

VSQ20.description_html: Underlying cause of death by Age Group, ICD 10 Diagnostic Group, Year and Sex
